behavior locate_remote_control(remote_control:item):
    body:
        bind remote_control: item where:
            is_remote_control(remote_control)
        # Select an item categorized as a remote control
        observe(remote_control, "Check location of remote control")
        # Observe to find the location of the remote control

behavior locate_remote(remote_control:item):
    body:
        if not visited(remote_control):
            observe(remote_control, "Find the remote controls position")
            # Observe the remote control to find its position
        achieve close_char(char, remote_control)
        # Move the character close to the identified location of the remote control
